==Links of Interest== ===Links=== * {{boxmatrix|7560}} :CPU: VR10 @800MHz (Dual Core), Modem: Lantiq PSB 80318, RAM: 256MB :mips34_128MB_grx5_dect441_4geth_1ab_2usb_host_2wlan11n_03188 ===Reviews=== * [https://www.nikktech.com/main/articles/peripherals/network/modem-routers/8144-avm-fritz-box-7560-ac1300-vdsl-adsl-modem-router-review ''AVM FRITZ!Box 7560 AC1300 VDSL/ADSL Modem Router'' on '''NikkTech'''] ==See also== :https://avm.de/produkte/fritzbox/ *[[AVM FRITZ!Box 7590]] - AC2600 WLAN Modem Router :(4x4 MU-MIMO, VDSL-35b/ADSL2+, DECT, Media Server) *[[AVM FRITZ!Box 7580]] - AC2600 WLAN Modem Router :(4x4 MU-MIMO, VDSL/ADSL2+, DECT, Media Server) *[[AVM FRITZ!Box 7560]] - AC1300 WLAN Modem Router :(VDSL/ADSL2, VoIP, DECT, Media Server) *[[AVM FRITZ!Box 7490]] - AC1750 WLAN Modem Router :(VDSL/ADSL2+, DECT, Media Server) *[[AVM FRITZ!Box 7430]] - N450 WLAN Modem Router :(VDSL/ADSL2+, VoIP/DECT, Mediaserver) *[[AVM FRITZ!Box 7390]] - N300 WLAN Modem Router :(VDSL/ADSL, DECT-Basis, Media Server) *[[AVM FRITZ!Box 5490]] - AC1750 WLAN Modem Router :(VDSL/ADSL2+, DECT, VoIP, Media Server) *[[AVM FRITZ!Box 4040]] - AC1300 WLAN Router :(GbE WAN, 4x LAN, USB 2.0/3.0, Mediaserver) *[[AVM FRITZ!Box 4020]] - N450 WLAN Router :(FE WAN, 4x LAN, USB 2.0, Mediaserver) *[[AVM FRITZ!Box 3490]] - AC1750 WLAN Modem Router :(VDSL/ADSL2+, 4x GbE LAN, Mediaserver) [[Category:English Documentation]]
